ygData.subject: Re: Runed Totem Staff
ygData.msgSnippet: What server are you on?   Most people will buy it off of you for 20pp.  You should just /auction it off.  I m looking for one right now also.  =)   But, I am
ygData.messageBody:
What server are you on? Most people will buy it off of you for 20pp. You should just /auction it off. I'm looking for one right now also. =) But, I am IN the section that I need to be in, to get one, and probably wouldn't pay 20pp for one. I'd give you your 13pp back if you're on Tarew Marr. 13pp is a very good deal for the staff.

Drev

> ----------
> From: Larimus La'shain[SMTP:larimus@...]
> Reply To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Sent: Monday, April 19, 1999 12:18 PM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Runed Totem Staff
>
> From: "Larimus La'shain" <larimus@...>
>
> After many levels of wishing I finally got my Runed Totem Staff for
> the bargan basement price of 13 pp (though I'm quite broke now).
> However it isn't as effective as I thought. Anything that is tough
> enough to need a good damage weapon I generally can't hit ( I believe
> my 2h blunt is maxed ) and anything that isn't that tough I can nuke
> in no time.
>
> So my question is should I sell it for 20 pp and buy more of my ranks
> spells ( i'm level 12 and only have Shock of Lightning and bind
> affinity ) If so which spells should I buy? Or should I stick with
> the staff. Just want some friendly advice.
>
> TIA
>
